short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is developed primary for Franklin Learning Centers Coaching Sessions, so you can share your screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used in the Franklin Learning Centers, Learning Management System Coaching. If you're not a Franklin Student, it probably isn't going to be useful to you.
